category.template: The college is Nalanda Institute of Technology (NIT Nalanda), located in Bhubaneswar, Odisha. It's NAAC A+ Accredited with 15,000+ students!
Phone: +91 99371 65074 Email: info@thenalanda.com Website: https://www.thenalanda.com
You can call Nalanda Institute at +91 99371 65074
Email the college at: info@thenalanda.com

Nalanda Institute of Technology Buddhist Villa, Chandaka Bhubaneswar, Odisha 751024
View on Google Maps: https://www.google.com/maps/dir//Nalanda+Institute+of+Technology
Nalanda Institute of Technology is NAAC A+ Accredited!
Nalanda Institute has: 15,000+ current students 50,000+ alumni worldwide 150+ programs offered

Major Departments at Nalanda Institute:
Computer Science & Engineering Electronics & Communication Engineering Mechanical Engineering Civil Engineering Electrical Engineering
Each offers B.Tech, M.Tech, and PhD programs!

Admission Process:
1. Apply online: https://www.thenalanda.com/admissions 2. Entrance exam (JEE Main for B.Tech) 3. Merit-based selection 4. Document verification 5. Fee payment
Eligibility: B.Tech: 10+2 PCM with 50%+ marks M.Tech: B.Tech/BE with 55%+ marks

Fee Structure (Approximate):
B.Tech: Rs 80,000 - Rs 1,20,000 per year M.Tech: Rs 60,000 - Rs 90,000 per year Hostel: Rs 40,000 - Rs 60,000 per year Mess: Rs 25,000 - Rs 30,000 per year
Payment modes: Online, DD, Cash For exact details: +91 99371 65074 Visit: https://www.thenalanda.com/fees
B.Tech fees are approximately Rs 80,000 to Rs 1,20,000 per year. Contact +91 99371 65074 for exact details.
Hostel fees range from Rs 40,000 to Rs 60,000 per year (AC/Non-AC options). Mess charges are additional Rs 25,000-Rs 30,000 annually.

Campus Facilities:
Academic Facilities: - Modern Library - Computer Labs - Research Centers - Smart Classrooms - Laboratories
Accommodation: - Separate Hostels (Boys and Girls) - 24/7 Security - Wi-Fi Campus
Student Life: - Sports Facilities - Cafeteria - Medical Center - Student Creativity Hub - Multiple Clubs

Hostel Facilities: - Separate hostels for boys and girls - 24/7 security - Wi-Fi enabled - Mess facilities - Recreation rooms
More info: https://www.thenalanda.com/hostel

Library Facilities: - Well-equipped with books and journals - Digital resources - Online databases - Reading halls - Study spaces
Visit: https://www.thenalanda.com/library

Placement Highlights:
Placement Rate: 85-90% Highest Package: Rs 45 LPA Average Package: Rs 6.5 LPA Companies: 150+ visit annually
Top Recruiters: TCS, Infosys, Wipro, Amazon, Microsoft, Google, Adobe, Accenture, L&T, NTPC
Training: Aptitude, coding, soft skills, mock interviews More: https://www.thenalanda.com/placement
The highest package offered in 2024 was Rs 45 LPA! Average package is Rs 6.5 LPA with 85-90% placement rate.

Top recruiters include: Tech: Amazon, Microsoft, Google, Adobe, TCS, Infosys, Wipro Core: L&T, Siemens, ABB, BHEL, NTPC Consulting: Deloitte, E&Y, KPMG, PwC Startups: Flipkart, Paytm, PhonePe, Swiggy
150+ companies visit annually!

Internship Programs:
Duration: 2-6 months Stipend: Rs 5,000 - Rs 50,000/month Companies: 200+ offer internships Conversion: 40% interns get PPO
Contact placement cell for opportunities!

Scholarship Information:
Nalanda Institute offers various scholarships for deserving students.
For details visit: https://www.thenalanda.com/scholarships Or call: +91 99371 65074

Student Portal Access:
Login at: https://www.thenalanda.com/student-portal
Features: - Attendance tracking - Exam results - Course materials - Fee payment - Notices and updates

Examination Information:
Exam Portal: https://www.thenalanda.com/examination Results: https://www.thenalanda.com/results Calendar: https://www.thenalanda.com/calendar

Student Clubs and Activities:
- Digital Art Club - Photography Club - Music Club - Writing Club - Technical Clubs - Sports Teams - Cultural Events
Explore: https://www.thenalanda.com/clubs

Sports Facilities:
- Indoor and Outdoor grounds - Basketball, Cricket, Football - Badminton, Tennis - Gym and Fitness center - Regular tournaments
More: https://www.thenalanda.com/sports

Alumni Network:
50,000+ Alumni worldwide!
Benefits: - Career support - Mentorship programs - Networking events - Continued learning
Join: https://www.thenalanda.com/alumni

Research at Nalanda:
- Cutting-edge technology research - Innovation labs - Industry collaborations - Student research projects - Faculty publications
Learn more: https://www.thenalanda.com/research
